examples.label: Tina NextJS Starter
examples.description: A Next.js blog site built with TinaCMS.

examples.label: Barebones Starter
examples.description: A simple TinaCMS starter that uses Next.js with no styling, and minimal content.

examples.label: Tina Self Hosted Demo
examples.description:
A demo of how to use self-hosted TinaCMS with Nextjs.\
\
Uses

* Vercel KV
* Github
* Auth.js

examples.label: Tina Remix Starter
examples.description: An example of how to use TinaCMS and remix.

examples.label: Tina Hugo Starter
examples.description: A starter showing how TinaCMS can be used with a static site generator like hugo. This starter could be modified to use any SSG.

examples.label: Tina Self Hosted SSG Demo
examples.description: This demo shows how self hosted Tina works with static site generators. This demo uses 11ty but could be adapted to use any SSG.

examples.label: Self Hosted Google Cloud Demo
examples.description: A demo of how to self host TinaCMS on google cloud.
